problem_text:
8.12. b) Let D0 denote the class of finite groups of deficiency zero, i. e. having a presentation ⟨X | R⟩ with |X| = |R|. Are the central factors of nilpotent D0-groups 3-generated?
D. L. Johnson, E. F. Robertson
answer: No, not always (G. Havas, E. F. Robertson, Commun. Algebra, 24 (1996), 3483–3487).
